title: Announcing changes in an airline flight
context: Announce over the loudspeaker that a flight has been delayed or canceled.

content.bestLine: Attention passengers, flight 123 has been delayed.

neutral.text: Flight 123 is delayed due to weather.
We apologize for the delay of flight 123.
Flight 123 will depart at a later time.
Please check the board for flight 123 updates.
Flight 123 has been rescheduled for tomorrow.
We regret to inform you that flight 123 is canceled.
Flight 123 is experiencing a short delay.
Please wait for further instructions on flight 123.

formal.text: Ladies and gentlemen, flight 123 has been delayed.
We regret to inform you that flight 123 is canceled.
Flight 123 will depart as soon as possible.
Please contact our staff for assistance with flight 123.
Flight 123 has been rescheduled due to unforeseen circumstances.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the delay of flight 123.

patterns.template: We apologize for the [options] of flight [options].

lines.text: Attention passengers, flight 123 has been delayed.

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: How long will the delay be?

lines.speaker: Airline Staff
lines.text: We regret to inform you that flight 123 is canceled.

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: What are our options for alternative flights?
